thread.title: Salman Khan starrer Bajrangi Bhaijaan box office collections reach Rs 283 crore
thread.title_full: Salman Khan starrer Bajrangi Bhaijaan box office collections reach Rs 283 crore | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Salman Khan starrer Bajrangi Bhaijaan box office collections reach Rs 283 crore
text:
With a solid momentum behind it, Salman Khan starrer Bajrangi Bhaijaan box office collections look to be headed towards the Rs 300-crore mark in domestic market and in the process is hurting new release of Ajay Devgn’s ‘Drishyam’.
Salman Khan and Kareen Kapoor starrer Bajrangi Bhaijaan has been declared an all-time blockbuster by Taran Adarsh. He took to Twitter to make the Bajrangi Bhaijaan announcement. Here are the figures he has revealed:
“#BajrangiBhaijaan (Week 3) Fri 4.11 cr, Sat 6.80 cr. Total: 283.16 cr. All-time blockbuster.”
